title: Login screen not showing up :(
body: Recently I have been having an issue logging into league. Whenever i click to open league and press the launch button on the patcher page nothing happens. The patcher disappears and the login screen doesn't show up, no matter how long i wait. The only way i can log in now is to continuously open league until the login screen finally decides to show up. I can play normally after logging in but i would just like to know if anyone has any solutions to this issue because its a bit of a pain.

replies.body: Have you tried reinstalling the client?
